message.body: Yeah, im not digging it, it seems like itll be proppy and costumey and slow and because it seems so far from ready i think we should drop it
K, let's watch it on Sunday and see what we think
Was it from Cami? Jesus fucking Christ I told her to stop contact. Does anybody listen to me???? Ugh
Oh, yup, no, that's thru Phin and we agrees to budget for sound this year, see if it can make a difference
Heehee! Im about to get some and meet with Phin ;)

Ive looked at the emails that cami had back n forth with tom waits ppl, they calculated $1200 to charge us thinking it to be 4% of our gross box office revenue, im not sure that the shaggy song has anything to do with it
Randall is gonna send me his emailsfrom a few years ago so i can look them over
I think i should take this on
That is awesome! Remember to state we are a non profit, so What we gross (what we pay people) after production costs is only 3-5,000
